description: Main School:T5 - Lombardy Poplar - fell to ground level; T23 - Cherry - cut back from building to allow 2m clearance +remove smaller stemT45 - Lombardy Poplar - pollard to match others in line; T46 - Lombardy Poplar - pollard to match others in lineT47 - Lombardy Poplar - pollard to match others in line; T48 - Lombardy Poplar - cut back to boundaryT49 - Lombardy Poplar - fell to ground level; T55 - Lombardy Poplar - pollard to match others in lineT56 - Lombardy Poplar - pollard to match others in line; T64 - Lombardy Poplar - pollard to match others in lineT74 - Lombardy Poplar - pollard to to 6m; T75 - Norway Maple - cut canopy back from roof area to 2m clearanceSchool Bunglow:T1 - Eucalyptus - crown reduction by 3m; T3 - Wild Cherry - sever ivy stems at base(done), sever additional heavy stems at 3m
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
